item.title: Drummer of Vengeance
item.description: Drummer of Vengeance is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Mario Gariazzo and starring Ty Hardin, Rossano Brazzi and Craig Hill.

item.title: Per il gusto di uccidere
item.description: Per il gusto di uccidere is the 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film debut directed by Tonino Valerii. It is also the first film to use the camera system known as 2P. It was filmed in Almería. It is produced by Francesco Genesi, Vincenzo Genesi, Daniele Senatore, Stefano Melpignano and Jose Lopez Moreno, scored by Nico Massi and edited by Rosa G. Salgado.

item.title: Bury Them Deep
item.description: Bury Them Deep is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Paolo Moffa and starring Craig Hill.

item.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
item.description: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave is a 1971 Spanish western film directed by Juan Bosch and starring Craig Hill, Fernando Sancho and Dominique Boschero. It is composed by Bruno Nicolai.

item.title: Ocaso de un pistolero
item.description: Hands of a Gunfighter is a 1965 Spanish-Italian western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: I Want Him Dead
item.description: I Want Him Dead is a 1968 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Paolo Bianchini and starring Craig Hill.
